title: PHPdoKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about PHPdoKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content: Example Create a loop that always runs at least once: "; $i--; } while($i > 6); ?> Definition and Usage The do keyword creates a loop which always runs at least once. It is used together with the while keyword to create a do...while loop. Related Pages The while keyword. Read more about do...while loops in our PHP do while Loop Tutorial . ★ +1

summary: This tutorial covers PHPdoKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPdoKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPdoKeyword and how to apply it in your projects.
